boost::xint::options::threadsafe Struct Reference

Ensures that the integer_t objects can be safely used by multiple threads. More...

Detailed Description

Ensures that the integer_t objects can be safely used by multiple threads.

This is the opposite of the copy_on_write option. It is the default behavior; the option is provided only to make it easier to write self-documenting code.

Note that any number of threads can safely read an integer_t object simultaneously, but if even one thread is writing to it, no other thread can safely access it for any reason until the write is done, even with this option. It is your responsibility to ensure that only the writing thread has access to the object during the write.
